snippet: Even while facing many medical problems, James Leak has taken literacy classes, battled to preserve his mobility and kept his apartment in Coney Island.
abstract: Jewish Association Serving the Aging, a beneficiary agency of the UJA-Federation of New York, helps 70-year-old James Leak attend literacy classes and buy an air conditioner for his subsidized Coney Island apartment.
lead_paragraph: Even while facing many medical problems, James Leak has taken literacy classes, battled to preserve his mobility and kept his apartment in Coney Island.

headline.print_headline: At 70, Still Fighting to Live Independently
headline.main: At 70, Still Fighting to Live Independently

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
